concept.title: Using Quick Filters on Report Values

conbody.p: You can click the filter icon to the right of each value in the report grid and select from the list of available quick filters to automatically add the desired filter to that column. The quick filters available depends on the type of information displayed in the column. As shown in the image below, the time stamp (ts) column shows the time related filters like day, month, etc. The hyperlink column shows the quick filters related to string manipulation. You can apply only one quick filter per column at a time. Adding a new quick filter to a column already containing one will overwrite the older filter.

For example in Figure 2-10-1 below, we can remove all items which contain the hyperlink value www.sensage.com by selecting the quick filter !=. The applied quick filter value (!=www.sensage.com) is visible in the filter text field (circled in red).
